TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit TabPage extends System.Windows.Forms.Panel

summary.span: 表示 中的單一索引標籤頁。

span.span: Represents a single tab page in a .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 控制項代表索引標籤式的頁面控制項。controls represent the tabbed pages in a control. 中的索引標籤頁的順序集合會反映在索引標籤的順序控制項。The order of tab pages in the collection reflects the order of tabs in the control. 若要變更控制項中的索引標籤的順序，您必須變更其在集合中的位置移除它們，並將它們插入新的索引。To change the order of tabs in the control, you must change their positions in the collection by removing them and inserting them at new indexes. 控制項會受限於其容器中，因此部分屬性繼承自基底類別不會影響，包括， ， ， ， ，和。controls are constrained by their container, so some of the properties inherited from the base class will have no effect, including , , , , , and . 中的索引標籤屬於但不是個別的一部份控制項。The tabs in a are part of the but not parts of the individual controls. 成員類別，例如屬性，會影響僅用戶端矩形的索引標籤頁，但不是索引標籤。Members of the class, such as the property, affect only the client rectangle of the tab page, but not the tabs. 此外，方法的會隱藏 [] 索引標籤。若要隱藏索引標籤，您必須移除控制項從集合。Additionally, the method of the will not hide the tab. To hide the tab, you must remove the control from the collection. > [!NOTE] > 在[!INCLUDE[dnprdnext](~/includes/dnprdnext-md.md)]，[索引標籤被視為屬於] 索引標籤頁面，以判斷何時和事件發生。In [!INCLUDE[dnprdnext](~/includes/dnprdnext-md.md)], the tab is considered part of the tab page for determining when the and events of the occur. 在舊版的.NET Framework 中，並事件的不會發生當焦點進入或離開工作索引標籤，但只當焦點進入或離開用戶端矩形的索引標籤頁。In earlier versions of the .NET Framework, the and events of the do not occur when focus enters or leaves a tab, but only when focus enters or leaves the client rectangle of the tab page. 如需有關此控制項如何回應並方法，請參閱下列成員： ， ， ， ， ， .For more information about how this control responds to the and methods, see the following members: , , , , , . > [!NOTE] > 中所包含的控制項之前顯示的索引標籤頁，且才會顯示索引標籤頁，在這些控制項中的任何資料繫結會啟動，不會建立。Controls contained in a are not created until the tab page is shown, and any data bindings in these controls are not activated until the tab page is shown. 在 [!INCLUDE[dnprdnext](~/includes/dnprdnext-md.md)]，則屬性可讓您指出索引標籤頁面的背景是否應該轉譯使用目前視覺化樣式。In [!INCLUDE[dnprdnext](~/includes/dnprdnext-md.md)], the property lets you indicate whether the background of the tab page should render using the current visual style. 發生這種情況只時及屬性值都`true`而屬性之父代是。This occurs only when the and property values are both `true` and the property of the parent is . 否則，為通常繪製背景。Otherwise, the background is painted normally. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例會建立與其中一個。The following code example creates a with one . [!code-cpp[TabPage#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/TabPage/CPP/form1.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[TabPage#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/TabPage/CS/form1.cs#1)] [!code-vb[TabPage#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/TabPage/VB/form1.vb#1)]

span.span: Gets or sets the background color for the .
A that represents the background color of the .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 預設值屬性是值屬性除非並屬性值都`true`和屬性之父代其值為，在此情況下的預設值屬性是。The default value of the property is the value of the property unless the and property values are both `true` and the property of the parent has a value of , in which case the default value of the property is . 子控制項，您將放在繼承根據預設，因此這個行為會導致背景的子系來使用目前視覺化樣式呈現控制項的值。Child controls that you place on the inherit the value by default, so this behavior causes the background of the child controls to render with the current visual style. 變更的值屬性會自動設定屬性設`false`。Changing the value of the property automatically sets the property to `false`. 如果您想背景來呈現使用視覺化樣式，但您想要繼承的子控制項值，指定時，請設定屬性設定之後屬性。If you want the background to render using visual styles but you want the child controls to inherit a value that you specify, set the property after you set the property.

remarks.format: ## Examples 下列程式碼範例會建立具有兩個物件，其中包含一個每元件。The following code example creates a with two objects, each containing one component. 參數`button2`傳遞給方法，它會擷取包含`button2`。The parameter `button2` is passed to the method, which retrieves the containing `button2`. 若要確認，則會擷取正確的索引標籤頁，屬性會設定包含`button2`至目前選取的索引標籤頁面。To verify that the correct tab page is retrieved, the property sets the containing `button2` to the currently selected tab page. MemberSignature.Value: .method familyhidebysig virtual instance void OnEnter(class System.EventArgs e) cil managed
Protected Overrides Sub OnEnter (e As EventArgs)

span.span: An that contains the event data.

summary.span: 引發 的 事件。

span.span: Raises the event of the .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 在[!INCLUDE[dnprdnext](~/includes/dnprdnext-md.md)]，[索引標籤被視為屬於] 索引標籤頁面，以判斷何時和事件發生。In [!INCLUDE[dnprdnext](~/includes/dnprdnext-md.md)], the tab is considered part of the tab page for determining when the and events of the occur. 在舊版的.NET Framework 中，並事件的不會發生當焦點進入或離開工作索引標籤，但只當焦點進入或離開用戶端矩形的索引標籤頁。In earlier versions of the .NET Framework, the and events of the do not occur when focus enters or leaves a tab, but only when focus enters or leaves the client rectangle of the tab page. 引發事件會透過委派叫用此事件處理常式。Raising an event invokes the event handler through a delegate. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 < [ 處理和引發事件](~/docs/standard/events/index.md)。For more information, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md). 方法也允許衍生類別處理事件，而不用附加委派。The method also allows derived classes to handle the event without attaching a delegate. 這是在衍生類別中處理事件的慣用技巧。This is the preferred technique for handling the event in a derived class.

para.span: 當在衍生類別中覆寫 時，請確定呼叫基底類別的 方法，使已註冊的委派能接收到事件。

span.span: When overriding in a derived class, be sure to call the base class's method so that registered delegates receive the event.

para.span: 當在衍生類別中覆寫 時，請確定呼叫基底類別的 方法，使已註冊的委派能接收到事件。

span.span: When overriding in a derived class, be sure to call the base class's method so that registered delegates receive the event.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 屬性會指出當使用者按下 TAB 鍵，在表單上接收焦點的控制項順序。The property indicates the order in which controls receive focus as a user presses the TAB key on a form. 控制項內含控制，不過，而不會收到焦點個別表單的定位順序的一部分。controls are contained within controls, however, and do not receive focus individually as part of the form's TAB order. 這個屬性是因此對於此類別沒有意義。This property is therefore meaningless for this class.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 控制項內含控制項並不會接收焦點個別表單的定位順序的一部分。controls are contained within controls and do not receive focus individually as part of the form's TAB order. 這個屬性是因此對於此類別沒有意義。This property is therefore meaningless for this class.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 變更屬性值不會自動置中 索引標籤上的新值如果已屬性值為。Changing the property value does not automatically center the new value on the tab if the has a property value of . 您可以藉由設定解決這項限制屬性或藉由移除從集合，並將它新增回集合。You can work around this limitation by setting the property or by removing the from the collection and adding it back to the collection. 兩個動作會自動文字置中。Both of these actions will automatically center the text. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例會建立與其中一個。The following code example creates a with one . 屬性會設定索引標籤頁面文字對`myTabPage`。The property sets the tab page text to `myTabPage`. remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個索引標籤頁面所屬。This tab page belongs to a . 使用者將滑鼠移索引標籤如果時顯示工具提示文字的屬性是`true`。The ToolTip text appears when the user moves the mouse over the tab if the property of the is `true`. 如需有關工具提示的詳細資訊，請參閱類別。For more information about ToolTips, see the class. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例會建立具有兩個物件。The following code example creates a with two objects. 設為允許 工具提示和索引標籤頁，則會指派工具提示文字。The is set to allow ToolTips, and the tab pages are assigned ToolTip text. summary.span: 取得或設定值，指出啟用視覺化樣式時是否使用目前的視覺化樣式呈現 背景。

span.span: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the background renders using the current visual style when visual styles are enabled.

value.span: 若要使用目前的視覺化樣式呈現背景否則， 。

span.span: to render the background using the current visual style; otherwise, .
The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 背景會使用目前視覺化樣式時，才並屬性值都`true`。The background uses the current visual style only when the and property values are both `true`. 當和屬性值都`true`而之父代的屬性是的預設值屬性是。When the and property values are both `true` and the property of the parent is , the default value of the property is . 子控制項，您將放在繼承根據預設，因此這個行為會導致背景的子系來使用目前視覺化樣式呈現控制項的值。Child controls that you place on the inherit the value by default, so this behavior causes the background of the child controls to render with the current visual style. 變更的值屬性會自動設定屬性設`false`。Changing the value of the property automatically sets the property to `false`. 如果您想背景來呈現使用視覺化樣式，但您想要繼承的子控制項值，指定時，請設定屬性設定之後屬性。If you want the background to render using visual styles but you want the child controls to inherit a value that you specify, set the property after you set the property.
